display_name: SuperScience Morningness and Eveningness Scale (SSMES): The bad news - You have to take a two-hour test. The good news: You can take it when you think you'll do your best.  What time is that?
description:
Item from Sleep for Science Questionnaire SuperScience Morningness and Eveningness Scale. [Carskadon MA et al., 1993 (PubMed ID: 8506460)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/8506460/)

[Search for all SuperScience Morningness and Eveningness Scale variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/sandd/variables?search=ssmes)
